flavor_text: [i]Feeling her talents wasted doing menial labor on the moon, she stole a Lunar Veil and fled to the earth. However, she was shortly discovered by the fugitive sage Eirin and sent straight back with a letter for her superiors the Watatsukis. Now directly under their supervision as a member of the Lunar Defense Corps, she hopes her new work will be meaningful.[/i]
